sentences.sentence: Ukraine is pushing ahead with its peace formula and nearly two years of war with Russia with a meeting of national security advisers in Davos.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Ukraine is pushing ahead with its peace formula to end nearly two years of war with Russia with a meeting of national security advisers from around the world in Davos.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: President Zelensky sent his chief of staff on ahead to attend the opening morning session.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Euronews was also there.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: The World Economic Forum annual gathering has started earlier this year with the fourth round of the Ukraine peace formula, talks hosted by Ukraine and Switzerland.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: And although there were more countries participating here in Davos compared to the previous round in Malta, China did not attend the gathering.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: I asked Andriy Yermak, the head of the office of the president of Ukraine, whether Kyiv is trying to get China on board.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: It's important that all the countries who is coming, they really, honestly want to participate and to help to end this war and to bring the peace.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: But there is a different thought idea how it's possible to do and different country have the different experience. Chinese Premier Li Qiang will lead the delegation in Davos this week. Ukraine recognizes that Russian ally China must be brought on board for any progress to be made.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Ukraine's President Volodymyr Zelensky was not at the Sunday meeting, but he will be here in Davos on Tuesday addressing the World Economic Forum the same day as Chinese Premier.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Sasha Vakulina for Euronews from Davos.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Hamas rockets launched from Gaza towards Israel. for Euronews from Davos.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_13
sentences.sentence: Hamas rockets launched from Gaza towards Israel.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_13
sentences.sentence: As the 100th day of the war between Israel and Hamas was marked by both sides, the militants aired video footage showing three Israeli hostages and ended with the warning, tomorrow we will inform you of their fate.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_13
sentences.sentence: Israeli officials generally declined to respond to Hamas' public messaging on the hostages, casting it as psychological warfare.

sentences.sentence: Only hours before, Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu vowed nobody would stop Israel and its war on Hamas. We do everything to return everyone to their homes.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: These efforts continue all the time, even in these moments.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_13
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile, in a televised speech, the leader of Lebanon-based Hezbollah, Hassan Nasrallah, claimed Israel's war on the Gaza Strip was mired in failure and that it would be forced to negotiate.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_13
sentences.sentence: Israel has been trading fire almost daily with Hamas allies Hezbollah.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_13
sentences.sentence: But tension has risen further in the aftermath of an airstrike that killed an elite commander of the Lebanese militia one week ago.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_13
sentences.sentence: Fischer, one week ago. Yemen Houthi rebels have fired missiles at US warships in the Red Sea, responding to

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: attacks carried out by the United States and the United Kingdom since Thursday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: The attack on Sunday marks the first US-acknowledged fire by the Houthis, following weeks of assaults on shipping in the Red Sea.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: UK Defense Secretary has said that he is monitoring the situation very closely.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: If the attacks don't stop, we will then have to take the necessary measures, he said.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: The behaviour in the Red Sea was completely unacceptable and we'll keep a very close eye if we have to take further action, then that's something that we would consider.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: But our intention was to have a very clear message sent to the Houthis, which I think is what has been achieved thus far.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: UK and US Navy repel largest, most complex Houthi attack in the Red Sea. Since October 17, 2023, Iranian-backed Houthi militants have attempted to attack and harass multiple ships in international shipping lanes.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Thousands of people held the demonstration against the extreme right in the German city of Potsdam on Sunday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: They included local resident chancellor Olaf Scholz.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: There has been nationwide outrage since a leak from a secret meeting revealed that right-wing groups and AFD politicians had discussed plans for re-migration, forced expulsion of people with migrant backgrounds.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Critics say the plans are reminiscent of the darkest chapter in German history.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Wives of Russian soldiers sent off to the war in Ukraine laid flowers at the Eternal Flame near the Kremlin in Moscow on Saturday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: According to a Russian news outlet, the gesture is a form of protest and a symbol that war always means death.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Security forces tried to stop and detain some of the demonstrators.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: According to members of the Way Home movement, who are protesting against the authorities. Laying flowers has become the only legal form of demonstration in Russia.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Former U.S. President Donald Trump has urged voters to brave the winter storm and vote in the Iowa caucus on Monday evening. Trump is hoping his campaign can halt his rivals' momentum and secure the Republican nomination ahead of this year's presidential elections.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Trump still maintains a huge lead in the polls, supported by nearly half of likely caucus-goers.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Former U.N UN ambassador and South Carolina governor Nikki Haley and Florida governor Ron DeSantis remained locked in a close battle for second. At a speech in Indianola on Sunday night, Trump called on voters to fight back against his political enemies and vote. He also claimed the four indictments he is currently facing are driven by false claims.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: After Iowa, the Republican primary shifts to New Hampshire, Nevada and South Carolina over the coming weeks before moving into the rest of the country this spring.

sentences.sentence: This was Ecuador's response to an unprecedented spiral of violence in the country.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Thousands of military and police officers raided several prisons in Ecuador on Sunday in search of weapons, ammunition and explosives, and to restore order after a week of unrest and the detention of more than 100 officials.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: In the coastal city of Marcella, where a prison officer died in a shootout between the security forces and inmates on Saturday, around 800 forces entered with tanks in the early hours of the morning.

sentences.sentence: The state of emergency has so far resulted in 1,105 arrests and the dismantling of 28 criminal groups, according to the latest government report.

sentences.sentence: The progressive academic turned politician was inaugurated on Monday after winning the presidential election in August, by a comfortable margin.

sentences.sentence: Arevalo has vowed to stamp out corruption but faces ongoing headwinds.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14

Το κυβερνήτη ασκεί ότι οι πράξεις θα ξεκινήσουν το πρωί, αλλά κάποιοι μέλης μείνουν σκεπτικοί. Τα νέα μέτρα που ανακοίνωσε η κυβέρνηση πώς τα βλέπετε.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Η ελληνική κυβέρνηση λέει ότι οι μέτρες θα αντιμετωπίσουν αδερφή προφητείων από τα πράγματα που είναι αφαιρετικά, που λέει ότι μπορεί να βγει σε πόδι μεταφέρον σε κρίσεις γλωσσοί.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03

sentences.sentence: They were called to the scene after the dance floor in the 15th century monastery collapsed, sending guests plummeting some three meters into the room below.
